Extract Global Market Cap of Cryptocurrency Market

Source: R/coinmarketcapr.R
get_global_marketcap.Rd

Extract Global Market Cap of Cryptocurrency Market

get_global_marketcap(currency = "USD")

Arguments

currency

currency code - Default is 'USD'

Value

A dataframe of to get global market cap of Cryptocurrencies Market

Examples

get_global_marketcap('AUD')
#>   total_market_cap_usd total_24h_volume_usd bitcoin_percentage_of_market_cap
#> 1         310383738667         129463586559                            61.96
#>   active_currencies active_assets active_markets        last_updated
#> 1               886          1364          19047 2019-06-27 22:39:31
#>   total_market_cap_aud total_24h_volume_aud
#> 1         443436867073         184961130601
get_global_marketcap('EUR')
#>   total_market_cap_usd total_24h_volume_usd bitcoin_percentage_of_market_cap
#> 1         310093425395         129301447844                            62.09
#>   active_currencies active_assets active_markets        last_updated
#> 1               886          1364          19047 2019-06-27 22:37:29
#>   total_market_cap_eur total_24h_volume_eur
#> 1         272837560894         113766654694
